item.title: 作者：你好，问一个PYTHON的问题
item.dc:creator: 你好，问一个PYTHON的问题
item.description:
wolfg
准备站好最后一班岗，帮助同事学习Ptyhon。但我不会离开Python，正相反，以后会更近了，可能会更加关注python在mobile方面的开发。 --
我近来玩一下PYTHON FOR WINCE,好像不支持中文，说编译ASCII错误。
请问WOLFG兄是怎么解决这个问题的？谢了先。
item.content:encoded:
wolfg

准备站好最后一班岗，帮助同事学习Ptyhon。但我不会离开Python，正相反，以后会更近了，可能会更加关注python在mobile方面的开发。 --

我近来玩一下PYTHON FOR WINCE,好像不支持中文，说编译ASCII错误。

请问WOLFG兄是怎么解决这个问题的？谢了先。

item.title: 作者：comliang
item.dc:creator: comliang
item.description:
I have installed maemocjk on my Nokia N800, but I don't know how to make the smart pinyin to display. Could someone show me the way? Thanks.
本人已经安装了maemocjk,但不知道如何使中文显示。
item.content:encoded:
I have installed maemocjk on my Nokia N800, but I don't know how to make the smart pinyin to display. Could someone show me the way? Thanks.

item.title: 作者：Ann
item.dc:creator: Ann
item.description: I will check the website out. I am sure that I may not fully understand everything, as I am so new to Maemo and Nokia N800. I will post some more questions if I have any. Thanks again for your help, Wolfg.
item.content:encoded: I will check the website out. I am sure that I may not fully understand everything, as I am so new to Maemo and Nokia N800. I will post some more questions if I have any. Thanks again for your help, Wolfg.

item.title: 作者：wolfg
item.dc:creator: wolfg
item.description:
hi ann,
To see Chinese characters, you need a Chinese font. To type Chinese pinyin, you need the ported SCIM pinyin ime. Both are included in MaemoCJK package. Visit http://maemocjk.garage.maemo.org/ for details.
item.content:encoded:
hi ann,

To see Chinese characters, you need a Chinese font. To type Chinese pinyin, you need the ported SCIM pinyin ime. Both are included in MaemoCJK package. Visit http://maemocjk.garage.maemo.org/ for details.

item.title: 作者：Ann
item.dc:creator: Ann
item.description:
I am totally new to Linux OS and Maemo, so I probably need a lot of help from you all.
A lot of instructions above seem to discuss how to convert N770/N800 UI into Chinese. I am OK with English UI, but I'd like to know how to SEE Chinese characters in Opera Browser and TYPE Chinese pinyin in Opera Browser and any Chat application. Any ideas?
Any helps are greately appreciated. I am sure that you all are the BEST!!!
item.content:encoded:
I am totally new to Linux OS and Maemo, so I probably need a lot of help from you all.

A lot of instructions above seem to discuss how to convert N770/N800 UI into Chinese. I am OK with English UI, but I'd like to know how to SEE Chinese characters in Opera Browser and TYPE Chinese pinyin in Opera Browser and any Chat application. Any ideas?

Any helps are greately appreciated. I am sure that you all are the BEST!!!

item.title: 作者：Jim
item.dc:creator: Jim
item.description:
Hi,
I installed your chinese font and theme and my opera on 770 can display chinese without problem. However, when I use 770 to go to news.163.com, I cannot add RSS on news.163.com. When I tried to do so the 770 told me "address invalid". I also manually type the RSS address on 770 and get same result. Could you tell me what should I do in order to add RSS on 163.com into my RSS?
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

I installed your chinese font and theme and my opera on 770 can display chinese without problem. However, when I use 770 to go to news.163.com, I cannot add RSS on news.163.com. When I tried to do so the 770 told me "address invalid". I also manually type the RSS address on 770 and get same result. Could you tell me what should I do in order to add RSS on 163.com into my RSS?
